DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate potential effect modify carbohydrate nutritional product obese pregnant woman reduce maternal glycemia .
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Intervention During Gestation Offspring Health
DOC.criteria: Voluntarily sign date ICF , approve IEC/IRB provide applicable privacy authorization prior participation study . Obese ( BMI ≥ 30 ) determine prepregnancy BMI . ≥18 year age . ≥15+0 ≤16+6 week gestation singleton pregnancy . Willing follow supplementation protocol follow appropriate nutritional guidance refrain consume caloric nutritional supplement approve study staff , applicable . Willing provide body composition measure infant birth . Willing consider additional measure followup study conduct . Adverse maternal and/or fetal medical history expect alter blood glucose regulation . Previously diagnose diabetes , previous gestational diabetes , systemic lupus erythematodes , antiphospholipid syndrome , know renal disease , treat hypertension , uncontrolled hypothyroidism and/or cancer . Taking medication impact blood glucose . Previous bariatric surgery . Lactose intolerant and/or milk protein allergy require special diet regime . Participating another clinical trial would impact participation study .
